fields.name: header_txt1
fields.fieldText:
ONGOING MONITORING

& ADDITIONAL SERVICE CHECKLIST

fields.name: header_txt2
fields.fieldText: BUSINESS, TRUSTS AND NON-PERSONAL CLIENTS

fields.name: clientName_txt1
fields.fieldText: Client: {!Get_Case.Contact.FirstName} {!Get_Case.Contact.LastName}

fields.name: Date_of_original_engagement
fields.fieldText: Date of original engagement:

fields.name: Client_Code
fields.fieldText: Client Code:

fields.name: Date
fields.fieldText: Date:

fields.name: signature_txt1
fields.fieldText: Signature:

fields.name: header_txt4
fields.fieldText: Comments (Yes or No and additional explanations)

fields.name: header_txt5
fields.fieldText: Please use this checklist annually for AML purposes and when determining whether to continue with an engagement:

fields.name: a_txt
fields.fieldText:
Have you considered changes that may alter the original assessment of the acceptability of the client and engagement.

Examples of changes that shall cause a careful reconsideration are:

• Changes in name and/or address;

• a significant change in the size, structure or nature of the client's business;

• new sources of finance;

• a major change in the ownership, management or Trustees of the client;

• new regulatory reporting requirements: and/or

•  additional service added.

fields.name: b_txt
fields.fieldText:
Have you completed conflict checking to determine whether there were any:

• changes in the controlling ownership interests over the entity;

• changes in any controlling interests held by the entity;

• new listings in the group;

• any known change in service providers that may impact independence; or

• changes in classification of the entity as public interest.

Any such changes will require reconsideration of the firm’s conflict checking procedures

fields.name: b_txt2
fields.fieldText: If adding a new service, have we received Professional Clearance, or sent Professional enquiry to the current advisor?

fields.name: c_txt1
fields.fieldText: Is the business structure complex/unusual?

fields.name: c_txt2
fields.fieldText: Does the client transact with businesses in overseas countries with weak money laundering regimes?

fields.name: c_txt3
fields.fieldText: Is control remote?

fields.name: c_txt4
fields.fieldText: Is it a cash business?

fields.name: c_txt5
fields.fieldText: Do we have any concerns over the source of the client’s funds?

fields.name: c_txt6
fields.fieldText: Check that ‘a’ and ‘b’ are a “Yes” answer and all in ‘c’ are ‘No’ – responses that do not match meet this criteria means the client must be treated as HIGH risk

fields.name: c_txt7
fields.fieldText:
Have we met the client face to face?

 

 If yes who?  [Insert names here]

fields.name: Name1
fields.fieldText: Name

fields.name: c_txt11
fields.fieldText: If “No” the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: c_txt8
fields.fieldText: Has the client or a member of their family or a known close associate become a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?

fields.name: c_txt9
fields.fieldText: If “Yes” the client must be treated as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures as set out in the firm’s Client Acceptance Guidance Notes (available on the intranet) applied. Record EDD procedures undertaken here:

fields.name: c_txt10
fields.fieldText: Considering the above factors, the Money Laundering Risk is:

fields.name: header_5
fields.fieldText: ANTI-MONEY LAUNDERING REVIEW

fields.name: d_txt1
fields.fieldText: Has the risk level changed from Normal to High since the previously recorded risk level?

fields.name: e_txt1
fields.fieldText:
If “Yes” detail the additional verification work carried out:


NB: Identity verification

 

Normal Risk:   SmartSearch check (“Normal” risk setting) OR one government issued document with photo e.g. passport or driving licence;

 

High Risk:       SmartSearch check (“High” risk setting);

OR

One government issued document with photo e.g. passport or driving licence AND document detailing address e.g. utility bill.

fields.name: f_txt1
fields.fieldText:
Ensure that the “know your client” information held on our files for anti-money laundering purposes is updated for any changes identified above and in any other relevant respects. Ensure any changes to Beneficial Ownership are recorded and any additional ID verification undertaken.

 

 For Non-Audit services added to an Audit client please complete the questions below.

  1. The type of non-audit service giving as much detail as possible, including the fee level?
  2. The services are to be carried out by a separate team with a separate partner not involved in the audit which are?
  3. Any other safeguards that are deemed necessary by the Audit partner?
  4. Full details of the ethical considerations should be detailed on the Audit file by the Audit partner (this must be confirmed on the CF)?

fields.name: g_txt1
fields.fieldText:
Does the Engagement Letter cover all services we currently provide?

 

Attach a copy of the Engagement Letter below:

fields.name: h_txt1
fields.fieldText: Attach copies of the new client form, SmartSearch and onboarding documents here

fields.name: h_txt3
fields.fieldText: New Client Form

fields.name: i_txt1
fields.fieldText: Considering the answers to the above should we still be acting for the client?
